Detailed Description

This action acts as a stream that pushes particles along a particular velocity.

It is different from the force PSA because it does not apply an acceleration to the particle velocity. Instead, it converges the velocity to that of the stream. This is similar to the effect of wind or a stream of water on a leaf particle.

Drag can be simulated by setting the vector to the zero vector.

float StreamPSA::halfLife ( void   )  const

This is the Get-Accessor for the half-life property of the StreamPSA.

This property is the time in seconds for the current velocity of the particle to reach half-way towards the streamPSA's velocity.

Returns:
A value in seconds.

const Vector3 & StreamPSA::vector ( void   )  const

This is the Get-Accessor for the vector property of the StreamPSA.
